start: echo 'Background agent environment started.' && bash .cursor/scripts/github-setup.sh && if command -v docker &> /dev/null; then sudo service docker start || true; fi

terminals.name: dashboard_dev_server
terminals.description: Runs the UI dashboard development server. Access it via the port Vite announces (usually 3000 or 5173 if 3000 is taken).

terminals.name: agent_validation
terminals.command: echo 'Running validation tests...' && bash .cursor/tests/test-background-agent.sh || echo 'Validation tests completed with status: $?'
terminals.description: Validates the background agent configuration files.

terminals.name: comprehensive_validation
terminals.command: echo 'Running comprehensive validation...' && bash .cursor/tests/validate_cursor_environment.sh || echo 'Comprehensive validation completed with status: $?'
terminals.description: Performs comprehensive validation of the background agent environment setup.

terminals.name: runtime_validation
terminals.command: echo 'Running runtime validation...' && bash .cursor/tests/test-agent-runtime.sh || echo 'Runtime validation completed with status: $?'
terminals.description: Validates the background agent runtime environment.

terminals.name: git_status
terminals.command: git config --list && echo '----- Repository Status -----' && git status && echo '----- Branches -----' && git branch -a
terminals.description: Displays git configuration and repository status for debugging purposes.

terminals.name: log_monitor
terminals.description: Monitors the background agent log file for debugging.
